author: mdzol.com
title: La reacción del Gobierno por el nuevo paro de la CGT: "Hibernaron 4 años" - MDZ Online
text: La reacción del Gobierno por el nuevo paro de la CGT: "Hibernaron 4 años" El subsecretario de prensa de la Nación opinó que en la CGT hay "sindicalistas con síndrome de abstinencia" El subsecretario de Prensa de la Nación, Javier Lanari, cruzó a la [CGT](https://www.mdzol.com/temas/cgt-156.html) por disponer un [paro general](https://www.mdzol.com/temas/paro-general-47580.html) para el 9 de mayo. Los tildó de tener "síndrome de absitencia" por no haber hecho ningún paro durante el Gobierno de Alberto Fernández, y que están decididos con "dejar la presidencia de [Javier Milei](https://www.mdzol.com/temas/javier-milei-359.html) como la que mayor cantidad de paros generales" tuvo. "Son sindicalistas con síndrome de abstinencia. Hibernaron 4 años en el periodo de mayor empobrecimiento de los trabajadores", escribió Lanari en su cuenta de X. Lo consideró como "un gran honor". La Confederación General del Trabajo (CGT) confirmó que el próximo jueves 9 de mayo realizará el segundo paro general contra el Gobierno de Javier Milei. Así se decidió durante la reunión del Consejo Directivo, un día después del extenso encuentro que los dirigentes de la central mantuvieron en Casa Rosada. En la sede de Azopardo al 800 también se decidió que el 1 de mayo, en el Día del Trabajador, se llevará a cabo una gran movilización a Plaza de Mayo. Según se supo, de parte del Gobierno no hubo pedidos para cancelar una eventual huelga en el encuentro que mantuvieron con integrantes de la central obrera este miércoles en Casa Rosada. De hecho, trascendió que, a pesar del hermetismo, la reunión fue en buenos términos. Sin embargo, la delicada situación de la economía, los salarios deprimidos y la inflación, hicieron que la balanza se inclinará este jueves a favor de una nueva medida nacional. [](/politica/2024/4/11/javier-milei-visito-la-universidad-de-florida-dejo-una-polemica-definicion-sobre-el-brote-de-dengue-en-el-pais-419726.html) Gira internacional En Florida, Javier Milei desata la polémica por el brote de dengue en el país [](/politica/2024/4/11/la-justicia-determino-que-el-atentado-la-amia-la-embajada-de-israel-fue-ordenado-por-iran-ejecutado-por-hezbollah-419734.html) URGENTE La Justicia determinó que los antentados a la AMIA y la Embajada de Israel fueron ordenados por Irán [](/politica/2024/4/11/reforma-laboral-estos-son-los-puntos-mas-importantes-del-proyecto-que-la-ucr-quiere-introducir-en-la-ley-omnibus-419717.html) Negociaciones Reforma laboral: estos son los puntos que la UCR quiere en la ley ómnibus [](/politica/2024/4/11/la-tajante-decision-de-axel-kicillof-para-ir-contra-el-gobierno-de-javier-milei-419626.html) tensión por los presupuestos La tajante decisión de Axel Kicillof para ir contra el Gobierno de Milei [](/politica/2024/4/11/victoria-tolosa-paz-le-contesto-al-gobierno-por-la-polemica-en-la-compra-de-los-guardapolvos-419703.html) Polémica Tolosa Paz le contestó al Gobierno por la polémica de los guardapolvos [](/politica/2024/4/11/pesar-del-encuentro-con-el-gobierno-la-cgt-le-puso-fecha-al-proximo-paro-general-419699.html) Ahora A pesar del encuentro con el Gobierno, la CGT confirmó el paro para el 9 de mayo [](/politica/2024/4/11/escandalo-en-diputados-la-estrategia-de-marcela-pagano-ante-el-respaldo-del-ejecutivo-martin-menem-419672.html) Réplicas del terremoto Escándalo: la estrategia de Pagano ante el respaldo del Ejecutivo a Martín Menem [](/politica/2024/4/11/tension-el-tema-sensible-que-eligio-nicolas-maduro-para-pegarle-javier-milei-419669.html) Desde Miraflores

author: Kosta Andreadis
title: NVIDIA confirms that there's a GeForce RTX GPU shortage as we head into the holidays
text:
Yesterday, we reported on NVIDIA's third-quarter financial earnings report, in which the company recorded [$35.1 billion in total revenue](https://www.tweaktown.com/news/101790/nvidias-q3-revenue-is-up-94-from-year-ago-which-includes-growth-for-gaming/index.html) and a gross margin of 74.6%. Granted, a big chunk of this comes from NVIDIA's Data Center business, where its AI GPUs and services are leading a worldwide computing boom.
Still, its GeForce RTX Gaming and AI PC sector also delivered impressive revenue growth, $3.3 billion for the quarter, up 15% from a year ago. However, this figure is set to drop, as NVIDIA CFO Colette Kress strongly hinted there will be supply constraints for the current quarter and that there could be a gaming GPU shortage until the new calendar year.
"Our gaming supply, given what we saw selling through, was moving quite fast," Colette Kress responded when asked for further clarification. "The challenge that we have is, how fast could we get that supply into the market for this quarter? Not to worry, I think we'll be back on track with more supply as we turn the corner into the new calendar year."
The statement adds weight to recent rumors that NVIDIA is halting production on several GeForce RTX 40 Series gaming GPUs, with stock expected to dry up within a month or two. This is because NVIDIA and its partners are shifting their focus to the next-gen Blackwell-powered GeForce RTX 50 Series. The company is expected to launch the GeForce RTX 5090, RTX 5080, and RTX 5070 in January and February 2025.
NVIDIA hasn't formally confirmed or announced when we'll see next-gen GeForce cards hit the market, but many people expect a CES 2025 announcement with a retail launch to follow a few weeks after that. In the meantime, it does look like there will be fewer GeForce RTX 40 Series GPUs on digital and physical retail shelves from now until the new year.

[NVIDIA's Q3 revenue is up 94% from a year ago, which includes growth for Gaming](https://www.tweaktown.com/news/101790/nvidias-q3-revenue-is-up-94-from-year-ago-which-includes-growth-for-gaming/index.html) - Read more:
[GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs will 'seize the whole market,' cooling supplier claims](https://www.tweaktown.com/news/101734/geforce-rtx-50-series-gpus-will-seize-the-whole-market-cooling-supplier-claims/index.html) - Read more:
[GeForce RTX 40 Series GPUs are in short supply as NVIDIA prepares for the RTX 50 Series launch](https://www.tweaktown.com/news/101752/geforce-rtx-40-series-gpus-are-in-short-supply-as-nvidia-prepares-for-the-50-launch/index.html) - Read more:
[NVIDIA reportedly shifts production to GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs, only one Ada GPU lives on](https://www.tweaktown.com/news/101637/nvidia-reportedly-shifts-production-to-geforce-rtx-50-series-gpus-only-one-ada-gpu-lives-on/index.html)

title: indian railway trains delayed and few flights late due to fog and low visibility | Weather Update Today: घने कोहरे से आज भी कई ट्रेनें लेट, फ्लाइट पर भी असर, यात्रियों ने बयां किया अपना दर्द | Zee News Hindi

author: Hélène Ménal
title: Toulouse : Le Conseil d’Etat confirme l’expulsion de l’imam d’Empalot après sa condamnation pour un prêche antisémite
text: L’iman Mohamed Tataïat n’a jamais été aussi loin de revenir à Toulouse. Expulsé vers l’Algérie le 19 avril, il a vu ce jeudi son recours rejeté par le Conseil d’Etat, la plus haute juridiction administrative française. Celui qui officiait depuis 1987 à la mosquée du quartier d’Empalot a été\ncondamné en 2022 à quatre mois d’emprisonnement avec sursis pour avoir tenu des propos jugés haineux envers les Juifs lors d’un prêche, prononcé en 2017. Le contexte de la guerre Israël-Hamas Au moment de son expulsion, annoncée sur X (ex-Twitter) par le ministre de l’Intérieur Gérald Darmanin, les avocats de l’imam avaient déposé un recours dénonçant une expulsion expéditive et ne tenant pas compte de son comportement exemplaire depuis le prêche décrié. Mais le tribunal administratif a estimé fin avril que les propos incriminés revêtaient « une résonance et une gravité particulière depuis l’attaque du 7 octobre 2023 menée par le Hamas à l’encontre d’Israël ». Mohamed Tataïat était arrivé en France en 1985.

author: @natcroxon
title: Rain no deterrent to enjoying first day of 2024 in park, by beach | Illawarra Mercury | Wollongong, NSW
text: For Stuart Mikhael, drizzly, cool conditions are no impediment to a New Year's Day visit to Wollongong. Stuart travelled to the Illawarra from Liverpool on the morning of January 1 to spend the day with a few families, all hailing from the Sydney area, in what has become an annual tradition. "We used to do it overnight but life got a bit busier, so now we just come down for New Year's Day," he said. The group plans to spend the day picnicking, enjoying some drinks, and playing card and board games in Stuart Park before heading home in the late afternoon or evening. Typically a swim would also be on the agenda, but the weather has put a stop to that. Stuart's group was not the only one to brave the inclement weather to spend the first day of the year outdoors, with plenty of people setting up gazebos in the park. At least one person left their Sydney home in the pre-dawn hours to catch the first sunrise of 2024 over the ocean. Meanwhile lifeguards were busy earlier in the morning cleaning up Shellharbour North Beach following the revelry of the evening before. Resident Annette Regan said there were "lots of kids running around, lots of people" who were "extremely" well-behaved. People let off fireworks on the beach to welcome in the new year and, while such behaviour is illegal, Annette said the display was "amazing". "It was awesome, I'd never seen such big fireworks in the area," she said. Some people were seen packing up tents and camping chairs from the beach in the morning. There were no official fireworks in Shellharbour, but Wollongong had two displays - [one at Belmore Basin](https://www.illawarramercury.com.au/story/8473380/watch-wollongongs-midnight-fireworks-plus-dozens-of-photos-from-the-citys-harbour/) at 9pm, and another in the CBD at midnight. Kiama also celebrated with a fireworks display at 9pm. Sign up for our newsletter to stay up to date. We care about the protection of your data. Read our [Privacy Policy](/privacy/).
